doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/GS Consumer_ Previewing This Week's Conference. Expect a Constructive Tone. 高盛消费：本周会议前瞻。预计基调 积极。_2025-09-02

passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Equities 市场洞察 | 市场 | 股票
GS Consumer Previewing This Week's Conference Expect a Constructive Tone.
The 32nd annual Goldman Sachs Global Retailing Conference is this week, September 3rd- 4th. The schedule is awesome and the tone is likely to be pretty constructive.
第32届高盛全球零售会议将于本周9月3日至4日举行。日程安排非常精彩，整体基调预计将相当积极。
1) Specialist & trader views. A positive set-up.
2) Historical trading pattern around the conference.
3) Group positioning (PB Data).
4) Most requested meetings (this year vs prior years).
4) 最受欢迎的会议 (今年与往年对比)。

5) A few stocks in focus. A lot more single name content to come this week. Let me know if you need to connect with myself or our trader Eric Mihelc (who we will distribute a lot of the content through, as I will be at the conference).
5) 几只值得关注的股票。本周还会有更多针对单只股票的内容。如果你需要与我或我们的交易员 Eric Mihelc 联系，请告诉我（由于我将参加会议，我们会通过他分发大量内容）。
1. Top-Line Tone Will Very Likely Be Constructive. Is That Enough?
1. 整体基调很可能会是积极的。这是否足够？

Historically, the group outperforms during the conference. Last year was an exception but we had previewed that companies would sound a guarded tone at the conference. This year, we think corporates will sound more constructive on top- line. Recent commentary from corporates has seen a notable positive inflection, with companies across a range of end- markets noting acceleration in trends in July and further into August. Recent ShopperTrak data from the last 2 months has improved (see below). That would support comments very recently from ROST, TJX, WMT, HD, KSS, AS, etc who all spoke to strong July trends and steady or (or further) strength in August.

从历史来看，该板块在会议期间的表现通常优于大盘。去年是个例外，但我们当时已提前预期到公司在会议上的基调会较为谨慎。今年，我们认为企业在营收方面的表态会更为积极。近期企业的评论出现了明显的积极转折，多个终端市场的公司都提到7月份的趋势加快，并延续到8月份。过去两个月的ShopperTrak最新数据显示有所改善（见下文）。这与ROST、TJX、WMT、HD、KSS、AS等公司近期的评论相呼应，这些公司都提到7月份趋势强劲，8月份保持稳定甚至进一步走强。
This is the recent traffic chart from ShopperTrak traffic through August \(23^{\text{rd}}\) for the industry...
这是截至8月23日的ShopperTrak行业客流量最新图表...

- Powerful historical trading pattern around the conference, with outperformance 6 of the last 9 years and most of that on day 1. This has been less powerful the last 2 years, but that's because corporate tone was more guarded ahead of Election/tariff debate.围绕会议的强劲历史交易模式，在过去9年中有6年表现优异，而且大部分集中在第一天。过去两年这一趋势有所减弱，但这是因为在大选/关税讨论前，企业的基调更加谨慎。
Even while EPS guides have been choppier (primarily tariffs), top- line guides for 3Q have generally been above.
即使每股收益指引波动较大（主要受关税影响，第三季度的营收指引总体上仍高于预期。
Over the last month, we have had some of the Consumer names begin to see more constructive flow (seen both on the trading desk and in the GS PB data).
在过去一个月中，我们看到部分消费类公司开始出现更为积极的资金流入（在交易台和高盛PB数据中均有体现）。
While still off lower levels, many companies are speaking to higher promotions that are necessary to drive consumer's to purchase (PVH).
虽然仍高于低点，但许多公司表示需要更高的促销力度来推动消费者购买（PVH）。

Strong trends around events, but generally weak periods of spend between major events. Stocks did sell- off last week on beats, due to this concern that trends will slow post back- to- school (BBY, ULTA, DKS, URBn, etc).
围绕活动的趋势强劲，但在重大活动之间的消费期普遍疲软。由于担心返校季后趋势将放缓，上周股票在业绩超预期的情况下出现抛售（BBY、ULTA、DKS、URBN等）。
Price increases from tariffs is not fully in place yet, as indicated by WMT recently with EPS. 关税带来的价格上涨尚未完全落实，正如WMT最近在每股收益中所表明的那样。
Stocks did start to sell- off again last week on top- line beats (BBY, ULTA, DKS).
上周股票在营收超预期的情况下再次开始抛售（BBY、ULTA、DKS）。
2. 会议期间集团表现优于过去9年中的6年：

Until the last 2 years, there was a powerful historical trading pattern around the conference, with outperformance 6 of the last 7 years. This has not held true the last 2 years though (so it has dropped to 6 of the last 9). Corporate tone feels a bit better (on top- line) ahead of this conference.
在过去两年之前，围绕会议存在一个强劲的历史交易模式，在过去7年中有6年表现优异。然而，这一趋势在过去两年并未延续（因此降至过去9年中的6年）。在本次会议前，企业在营收方面的基调感觉略有改善。

Sentiment in the group seems to be mixed. Consumer dedicate investors I hear from had been playing 2Q beats, but overall positioning (macro/generalists/asset mgrs.) has kept positioning muted ahead of jobs and tariff uncertainty. As seen in the 1st chart below, specialty retail long/short ratios have picked up a lot the last 2 months, while durables have remained muted, despite optimism about rates/cycle trades.
该板块的情绪似乎较为分化。我听到的专注于消费领域的投资者一直在押注第二季度业绩超预期，但整体仓位（宏观/综合型/资产管理人）在就业数据和关税不确定性面前依然保持谨慎。从下方第1张图表可以看到，过去两个月专业零售的多空比率大幅上升，而耐用品板块则依然低迷，尽管市场对利率和周期性交易持乐观态度。
Prime Book US Long/Short Ratio (MV)
Prime Book US Long/Short Ratio (MV)
Source:GS PB Data,Vincent Lin
来源：GS PB数据，Vincent Lin
4. 按顺序排列的前十个最受欢迎的会议：
Most Requested in 2025: HD, WMT, TJX, ONON, DG, ULTA, FIVE, BURL, LOW, TSCO  2025 年最受欢迎：HD、WMT、TJX、ONON、DG、ULTA、FIVE、BURL、LOW、TSCO

Most Requested in 2024: HD, TJX, WMT, ONON, DKS, DG, FND, WSM, TSCO, BURL2024 年最受欢迎: HD、TJX、WMT、ONON、DKS、DG、FND、WSM、TSCO、BURLMost Requested in 2023: HD, DG, LULU, WMT, TJX, ONON, BURL, FND, LOW, TSCO2023 年最受欢迎: HD、DG、LULU、WMT、TJX、ONON、BURL、FND、LOW、TSCOMost Requested in 2022: TJX, HD, BURL, LOW, TGT, FIVE, DG, DKS, ULTA, WMT2022 年最受关注: TJX、HD、BURL、LOW、TGT、FIVE、DG、DKS、ULTA、WMT
\*\* HD remained #1 for the 3rd year in a row
\*\* HD 连续第三年保持第 1 名
\*\* ONON remained in the top 5 again this year after having been just outside it in the prior years
\*\* ONON 继去年进入前五后，今年再次保持在前五名，此前几年则刚好在前五之外
\*\* FIVE into the top 10 this year (#7) after being outside of it last year
\*\* FIVE 今年进入前十（第 7 名），而去年则未进入前十

WMT: #2 requested this year vs #3 last year and #4 before that. Moving on up! For WMT, top- line is clearly in good shape, as they indicated on EPS. The question is whether the 2Q gross margin miss was 1x and timing related, or if that's an overhang that will continue. We think investors want to buy WMT, are just being careful around timing, given the recent focus on beta and cyclicals for the market.
WMT: 今年的关注度排名第 2，去年是第 3，前年是第 4。节节攀升！对于 WMT 来说，营收表现显然良好，正如他们在每股收益（EPS）中所表明的那样。问题在于，第二季度毛利率的失误是否只是一次性且与时间有关，还是会持续成为压力。我们认为投资者想买入 WMT，只是由于近期市场对贝塔值和周期股的关注，在入场时机上更加谨慎。

GAP: Expectations around the 2025 and 2026 operating income guide were extremely low last week. Instead, they guided much better than feared and noted no major concerns of wraparound tariffs into 2026. Despite that, the stock was just +1.5%. Investors will have a lot of questions around why they feel so confident in mitigation opportunities.
GAP: 上周市场对其 2025 年和 2026 年营业收入指引的预期极低。但他们给出的指引远好于预期，并指出对 2026 年可能出现的关税延续没有重大担忧。尽管如此，股价仅上涨了 1.5%。投资者会有很多问题，想知道他们为何对缓解风险的机会如此有信心。

ULTA: They put up an amazing quarter last week. Despite that, the stock traded - 7% and drew in a tremendous amount of inbounds. The feedback was mainly 1) positioning and 2) some hold- up over their SG&A guide for 2H and implied flow- through opportunity into
2026. Expect a lot of questions on SG&A.
ULTA：他们上周交出了一份出色的季度业绩。尽管如此，股价仍下跌了 \(7\%\) ，并吸引了大量投资者咨询。反馈主要集中在两方面：1）仓位配置，2）对下半年销售、管理及行政费用（SG&A）指引以及其对2026年潜在利润传导机会的担忧。预计会有大量关于SG&A的问题。

DKS: Another name with a big comb last week and a decent sell- off in response. Feedback was positioning but also some highlighting they walked back the gross margin expansion expectations for the year. They did note they would have more SG&A leverage to make up for it, but there were quite a few comments focusing on the gross margin side.
DKS：上周又一个大幅波动的名字，随后出现了相当明显的回调。反馈的原因包括仓位调整，但也有一些人指出他们下调了全年毛利率扩张的预期。他们确实提到会通过更多的销售及管理费用（SG&A）杠杆来弥补，但仍有不少评论集中在毛利率方面。

ACI & BJ: Both names have traded very weak the last 1- 2 months on concerns that price investments will need to ramp. This has been a consistent overhang on the names on and off the last year but we have picked up incremental questions (and short activity) on both around this theme the last 2 months.
ACI 和 BJ：过去 1- 2 个月，两只股票的走势都非常疲弱，原因是市场担心价格投入需要加大。这一担忧在过去一年中时有反复，但在过去两个月，我们在这一主题上收到了更多的额外问题（以及空头活动）的关注。
CROX: One of the few who gave a well below consensus out- quarter top- line guide. Expect investors will drill down on that.
CROX：少数几家公司之一，给出了远低于市场一致预期的下一季度营收指引。预计投资者会对此进行深入追问。
A lot more single name content to come the next 3 days, let me know if you need to connect with myself or our trader Eric Mihelc...

Agenda:  Wednesday, September 3rd:  8:00 AM: Goldman CEO  8:55 AM: URBIN, BBWI, MAT  9:35 AM: SN, TSCO, BYD.CN  10:20 AM: SIG, HD  11:00 AM: VFC, WSM  11:40 AM: SVV, BJ, BLDR  12:30 PM: WMT  1:10 PM: SHAK, LOW, Li & Fung  1:50 PM: EAT, EYE, ATZ.CN  2:35 PM: LEVI, ONON, GO  3:15 PM: GOOS, CROX  3:55 PM: FIGS, FIVE

Thursday, September 4th: 8:15 AM: YUM, Circana 8:55 AM: GCO, ULTA, WING 9:35 AM: GAP, MODG, LAD 10:20 AM: WRBY, GPC, ODD 11:00 AM: Private Equity Panel 11:40 AM: PVH, DKS, VVV 12:30 PM: GS Lead Economist 1:10 PM: VSCO, ASO, LZB 1:50 PM: M, WOOF, DRVN 2:35 PM: Wayfair

Hosting 1x1 Meetings Only: Adidas, Ahold, ACI, CAR, BBY, BRLT, Burberry, Burlington, CRI, COLM, DG, FEMSA, FND, Hugo Boss, LEG, LTH, MillerKnoll, NCLH, OLLI, Pandora, ROST, SGI, SHOO, SHW, TJX, TREX, Wal- Mart de Mexico, WHR, WWW, YETI
